title: Flu cases surging , say doctors , but health ministry says there no outbreak
description: Flu is surging across Jamaica, sickening scores of people with fevers, aches, sore throats and other nasty symptoms, according to local doctors, though the Ministry of Health and Wellness maintains that influenza activity remains within seasonal norms. Dr Lisa Franklin-Banton, a paediatrician at We R Kids Paediatric Centre, told Observer Online that she has seen an increase in Influenza A cases among children over the last three weeks. “I am..., Created with ♥ by Rumble
